title: Understanding Flash Fill
text: Flash Fill is a feature in Excel that helps automate repetitive tasks by recognizing patterns in your data.

title: How Flash Fill Works
text: When you start typing a pattern in a column, Flash Fill can automatically fill in the rest of the column based on the pattern it detects.

hintAnswer: Excel recognizes patterns and automatically fills in data
title: Identifying the Correct Answer
text: Which of the following best describes Flash Fill?
choices: Excel recognizes patterns and automatically fills in data
